br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.rpg

Class RpgScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.rpg.RpgScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class RpgScreen
extends BaseScreen
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    The main screen of the RPG World. It gets the user input and sends the command to the RPG Controller. Also, renders all the visual elements.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • RpgScreen

        public RpgScreen(ShadowStruggles game,
         Controller controller,
         RpgController rpgController)
        The constructor initializes the objects and defines itself as the controller's viewer.
        Parameters:
        game - The ShadowStruggles instance, used for overview.
        controller - The game controller to handle screen interactions.
        rpgController - The RPG mechanic controller.
